CustomField.formula: AND( Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'CML'), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'MM') ), NOT( OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'COR' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'SEL' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'STR' ) ) ), NOT(CONTAINS(Opportunity_Record_Type__c, 'Industrial')), NOT(CONTAINS(Opportunity_Record_Type__c, 'Machine Vision')) )&& Discount_Approval_Needed__c = TRUE
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for MM Rev Oppty
